-- DDL generated by Postico 1.5.19
-- Not all database features are supported. Do not use for backup.

-- Table Definition ----------------------------------------------

CREATE TABLE api_equipment (
    equipment_id character varying(10) PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE,
    serial_number character varying(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-'::character varying UNIQUE,
    year smallint DEFAULT '0'::smallint CHECK (year >= 0),
    description character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    company_assign character varying(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-'::character varying,
    ownership character varying(15) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-'::character varying,
    hours integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
);

-- Indices -------------------------------------------------------

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX api_equipment_equipment_id_key ON api_equipment(equipment_id text_ops);
CREATE INDEX api_equipment_equipment_id_6543553b_like ON api_equipment(equipment_id varchar_pattern_ops);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX api_equipment_pkey ON api_equipment(equipment_id text_ops);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX api_equipment_serial_number_key ON api_equipment(serial_number text_ops);
